title: Exquisite N173 Old Judge Harry Wright SGC 5

posts.post_title: Exquisite N173 Old Judge Harry Wright SGC 5
posts.post_content:
Sent to Love of the Game Auctions for their April auction 

One of the nicest examples in existence of the Godfather of baseball.
Please pm with interest. I can share coined pics/videos and have plenty of references available.
Coming soon to an auction house near you.
